name: Eufloria Adventures
summary:
Eufloria Adventures is a completely new game set within the Eufloria Universe. It debuted on PlayStation Mobile.

Players control and evolve a seedling ship, used to explore and conquer new colonies.

The player travels through three large worlds, whose many levels are filled with lush environments, strange plants and creatures, and rival colonies.

Conquering enemy territory allows the player to grow and evolve three different ship types, each with a unique set of attributes and abilities.

The player can discover, and use, “Ancient Artifacts”, which offer unique abilities that enhance the ship’s capabilities.
info:
• 开发: Omni Systems
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014/04/15
  • 官方网站: http://www.omni-labs.com/eufloria-adventures/
